Above Average Movers

Thank you for choosing Above Average Movers. Our mission is to relieve the stress of moving from our clients and provide a pleasant yet hardworking experience, exceeding your average moving service.

Over the years we have worked hard to become the moving company of choice for many in metro Atlanta and beyond; exceeding expectations along the way. Here is why we are Above Average Movers:

Unmatched service

From small deliveries to residential and commercial moves we do it all. With our trained experts and quality packing supplies and materials, we use dedicated work ethics to ensure quality care while packing and unpacking your valuable items.

Versatility

As our motto states, no job is too big or too small. Above Average Movers applies the same standard of excellence to every move and delivery. Whether you’re switching apartments or moving your office spaces we have the team and resources to make it happen. Local or long distance, across town or across the country, our professional team will be with you every step of the way.

Affordability

At Above Average Movers, we believe in doing an excellent job for a fair price, with no suprises and hidden fees. We’ll always provide a free estimate of any job you need no matter how big or small.

These are just a few of the ways in which Above Average Movers strives to earn the ongoing trust and respect of our customers, and why so many of our customers recommend us to their friends. Our customer testimonials prove it. We would love to be your moving or delivery service provider. For a free estimate, contact us at 678-225-8938, or use our estimate request form. We look forward to hearing from you!

Thank you for choosing Above Average Movers.
